comments:
I encoutered a problem while I was trying to develop a project under Eclipse BPEL Project, and the Eclipse platform was automatically turned off. When I try to restart Eclipse, a dialog box pops up telling me to read the log file : workspace\.metadata\.log

The following are two parts from the file. The first one is the log of the session that i think the platform error happened. The second one is the log of the session when I try to start Eclipse.

I thought it is started by a SWT error, becaused I kind of remembered the dialog box saying someething wrong about SWT poped up before the Eclipse Platform went down.


///////////       FIRST ONE    //////////////////
!SESSION 2007-01-23 16:28:43.281 -----------------------------------------------
eclipse.buildId=M20060921-0945
java.version=1.5.0_09
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=zh_CN
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86
